titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, with respect to the definition of the term "law enforcement officer" under the Federal Employees' Retirement System.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Executive Comment Requested from OMB, OPM.
Referred to Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 8/7/1987--Introduced. Amends provisions of law comprising the Federal Employees' Retirement System to remove the requirement that a law enforcement officer who is transferred to a supervisory or administrative position must have performed other law enforcement duties for at least ten years.
